newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Jan 8.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Jan 8.

text.p: These are leading stories in afternoon daily Le Monde.
-- The Netherlands start their shift in the European Union presidency, will tackle progress toward a single currency and planned reforms of European institutions.

-- Government calls for a quick privatisation of new company to be formed by a merger of aircraft manufacturers Aerospatiale and Dassault Aviation. Privatisation commission to determine value of two groups and merger parities.
-- Credit Lyonnais board meeting to examine tomorrow details of a recapitalisation plan for the ailing state-owned bank.
-- General Electric buys Indosuez subsidiary Locafrance Equipement real-estate credit house.
